Posts.Content: I was diagnosed 3+4=7 Gleason; 2.4 PSA; T2B. 6 of 12 cores nearly 100% positive on the left side. My head is spinning. There are too many choices. I'm nearly convinced I need the davinci with Dr. Esposito of Hackensack but I saw this commercial on TV about the cyber knife. What are your thoughts on this?
Posts.Title: Wondering about Cyber Knife
